mapper.sql: r.id, r.student_id, r.report_type, r.title, r.overall_score, r.report_period_start, r.report_period_end, r.dimension_scores, r.trends_analysis, r.achievements, r.improvement_areas, r.recommendations, r.generated_by, r.is_published, r.created_at, r.published_at
, u.display_name AS student_name, u.student_number AS student_number
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ability_reports ( student_id, report_type, title, overall_score, report_period_start, report_period_end, dimension_scores, trends_analysis, achievements, improvement_areas, recommendations, generated_by, is_published, created_at, published_at ) VALUES ( #{studentId}, #{reportType}, #{title}, #{overallScore}, #{reportPeriodStart}, #{reportPeriodEnd}, #{dimensionScores}, #{trendsAnalysis}, #{achievements}, #{improvementAreas}, #{recommendations}, #{generatedBy}, #{isPublished}, NOW(), #{publishedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ability_reports r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.student_id = u.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
SELECT FROM ability_reports r WHERE r.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY r.report_period_end DESC
SELECT FROM ability_reports r WHERE r.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY r.report_period_end DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalReports, SUM(IF(is_published = 1, 1, 0)) AS publishedReports, MAX(overall_score) AS topScore, MIN(overall_score) AS minScore, AVG(overall_score) AS avgScore FROM ability_reports WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
SELECT report_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ability_reports WHERE student_id = #{studentId} GROUP BY report_type
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM ability_reports WHERE report_type = #{reportType} AND (created_at < #{lastGeneratedBefore} OR created_at IS NULL)
